Package de.db.derpate.servlet

Class GodfatherFilterServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • de.db.derpate.servlet.BaseServlet
          • de.db.derpate.servlet.FilterServlet
            • de.db.derpate.servlet.GodfatherFilterServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    @WebServlet("/findGodfather")
public class GodfatherFilterServlet
extends FilterServlet
    This servlet is only available for Trainees and is used to filter available godfathers or - if the trainee already selected a godfahter - get information of their selected godfather.
    Author:
    MichelBlank
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        protected void onGet​(@NonNull javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                     @NonNull javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from class: FilterServlet
        Method, that get's called, after all filters were checked and should handle get requests.
        By default, responds with a "method not allowed" (code 405) http status, when not overwritten.
        Overrides:
        onGet in class FilterServlet
        Parameters:

        resp - HttpServletResponse

      • toJson

        public static @NonNull com.google.gson.JsonObject toJson​(@Nullable Godfather godfather,
                                                         boolean more)
        Reads the informations of a godfather and puts them into a JsonObject.
        The encrypted id, the first name, location name, teaching type name, job name, educational year and description is added to the JsonObject. If selected is true, the last name, eMail and picktext will be added too.
        Parameters:
        godfather - the Godfather to add
        more - if the trainee has already commited to this godfather
        Returns:
        a JsonObject containing the informations

      • toJson

        private static @NonNull com.google.gson.JsonArray toJson​(@Nullable java.util.List<@NonNull Godfather> list,
                                                         boolean more)
        Uses the toJson(Godfather, boolean) method to create a JsonArray, that may be used to create a json string of godfather informations
        Parameters:
        list - a List (can be null) containing non null Godfathers
        selected - if more information should be shown
        Returns:
        a JsonArray containg informations
